thread.title: Win a hospitality experience for two at the Qatar Goodwood Festival
thread.title_full: Win a hospitality experience for two at the Qatar Goodwood Festival - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a hospitality experience for two at the Qatar Goodwood Festival
text: The Qatar Goodwood Festival takes place from Tuesday, July 28 – Saturday, August 1 and is the sporting and social highlight of the summer season. We are giving one lucky reader and their guest the chance to be at this iconic meeting – affectionately known as ‘Glorious Goodwood’, on Tuesday 28 July where they will enjoy an unforgettable day out with full hospitality in the award-winning Secret Garden. Situated in the premier Richmond Enclosure in a sought-after position near the winning post, this enchanting and beautiful facility is your base for the day. After a Champagne reception, you will be treated to a three-course lunch with unlimited wines, beers and spirits throughout your experience at Goodwood. Afternoon tea and reserved car parking are also included in this fantastic prize. To enter, just fill in the form below. Online Form - Win a hospitality experience for two at the Qatar Goodwood Festival Follow @telegraph
